The diagram depicts using a mail transfer agent (MTA) on e-mail servers. The servers are labeled SMTP /POP3 Server. The M UA client sends an e-mail to recipient@domain.com, which arrives at the first e-mail server. A speech bubble above this server says: "Is the recipient in my list of recipients? No. Forward e-mail to another e-mail server."

The caption text states: "Mail Transfer Agent process governs e-mail handling between servers".
